required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Trial to Evaluate Bioequivalence of LCB01-0371 in Different Batches
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-label, Single-dose, Two-way Crossover, Phase 1 Trial to Evaluate Bioequivalence of "LCB01-0371(Batch#1650006)" and "LCB01-0371(Batch#3183817R)" in Healthy Adult Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this clinical trial is to evaluate bioequivalence of "LCB01-0371 (Batch# 1650006)" and "LCB01-0371(Batch#3183817R) in healthy adult subject

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic evaluation: The observed maximum concentration(Cmax)
primary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetic parameters will be assessed using non-compartmental method

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic evaluation:Area under the blood concentration-time curve (AUClast)
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration curve from zero until the last measurable concentration

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic evaluation: Time to reach Cmax(Tmax)
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetic parameters will be assessed using non-compartmental method
Pharmacokinetic parameters will be assessed using non-compartmental method

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic evaluation: Apparent total body clearance after extravascular administration(CL/F)
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetic parameters will be assessed using non-compartmental method

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic evaluation:Apparent volume of distribution after extravascular administration(Vd/F)
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacokinetic parameters will be assessed using non-compartmental method

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic evaluation:Area under the blood concentration-time curve (AUCinf)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the curve from time 0 extrapolated to infinite time

arm_group.description: Period 1: LCB01-0371 tablet 400mg (Reference drug, Batch# 1650006) Period 2: LCB01-0371 tablet 400mg (Test drug, Batch# 3183817R)
Period 1: LCB01-0371 tablet 400mg (Test drug, Batch# 3183817R) Period 2: LCB01-0371 tablet 400mg (Reference drug, Batch# 1650006)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. A person who is a healthy adult aged between 19 and 45 years old with the result of BMI between 18.0 kg/m2 and 28.0 kg/m2
2. A healthy adult whose weight is over 50 kg
3. A person who is deemed suitable for a clinical trial subject in physical examination, vital sign tests, diagnostic examination, and 12-lead ECG by the medical doctor, etc.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. A person who has a clinically significant history of the disease, such as liver, kidney, gastrointestinal disease, respiratory tract disease, muscular-skeletal disease, endocrine disease, nervous system disease, blood âˆ™ tumor disease, cardiovascular disease, etc.
2. A person who has a history of gastrointestinal diseases or surgery that may affect the absorption of IP, etc.
